name: Rewind Err
description:
Err is a prototype maintenance robot designed to keep this facility powered ON but there's a flaw in Err's design which requires Err to be rewound in order to work. 

You have to rewind Err to keep it functional and use Err's throwing ability to throw batteries at the power stations to keep the facility running.

There are a total of 6 sectors to power up. Good  luck!

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows: Movement
  • Left Mouse Button:  Throw/Recall Battery
  • ESC: Open/Close Pause Menu

Credits

  • Designer & Programmer: Nelson Laracuente

Special Thanks:

  • Michael P. for Artwork/Sound Effects.
  • Jesse P. for the  Music:.

Assets:

I used assets available from the unity store

  • Purple Jump: Sanctuary
  • 256px: SCI-FI Barrels 40 Sample
  • Asset Store Original: Snaps Prototype
  • Wind up key from a 3D models site I forget the name (will have to research)
